mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", material_id AS "materialId", material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", stock_id AS "stockId", loca_number AS "locaNumber", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_cabinet1_repair_return_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockId},'%')
and loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet1_repair_return_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockId},'%')
and loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')

select returnTask.id AS "id", returnTask.task_number AS "taskNumber", returnTask.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", returnTask.material_name AS "materialName", returnTask.material_sku AS "materialSku", returnTask.material_id AS "materialId", users.user_name AS "operator", users.work_team AS "workTeam", info.sizes as "sizes", returnTask.material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", returnTask.stock_id AS "stockId", returnTask.loca_number AS "locaNumber", returnTask.operator AS "operator", returnTask.operation_time AS "operationTime", returnTask.task_state AS "taskState", returnTask.create_time AS "createTime", returnTask.update_time AS "updateTime" from wms_cabinet1_repair_return_task as returnTask LEFT JOIN wms_user as users ON returnTask.operator=users.id_info LEFT JOIN wms_material_type as info ON returnTask.material_type_id=info.id where 1=1
and returnTask.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and returnTask.task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and returnTask.material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and returnTask.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and returnTask.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and returnTask.material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and returnTask.material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and returnTask.stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockId},'%')
and returnTask.loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and users.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and returnTask.operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and returnTask.task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and returnTask.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and returnTask.update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and info.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
and users.work_team like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workTeam},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet1_repair_return_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and stock_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockId},'%')
and loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
